title: Schedule Predictive Maintenance for a Bridge
description: The asset management system, based on sensor data and age, predicts that a bridge's expansion joints will need service soon.

tasks.description: Receive a 'Preventive Maintenance Recommended' alert for the 'Riverfront Bridge'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the predictive maintenance alert.

tasks.description: Review the asset's maintenance history and the data leading to the recommendation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the recommendation is valid based on wear-and-tear analytics.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the bridge maintenance crew and schedule it for a low-traffic period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the preventive maintenance work.
